item.title: inoel add a quote by Gene Fowler
item.description: "Writing is easy. You only need to stare at a blank piece of paper until drops of blood form on your forehead." -- Gene Fowler

item.title: inoel add a quote by Ian Fleming
item.description: "You only live twice: Once when you're born And once when you look death in the face." -- Ian Fleming

item.title: inoel add a quote by Malcolm Gladwell
item.description: "We have, as human beings, a storytelling problem. We're a bit too quick to come up with explanations for things we don't really have an explanation for." -- Malcolm Gladwell

item.title: inoel add a quote by Agatha Christie
item.description: "Hercule Poirot: I am an imbecile. I see only half of the picture. Miss Lemon: I don't even see that." -- Agatha Christie

item.title: inoel add a quote by Victor Hugo
